footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Xilonen | Update Date: 10/11/2024 | Editor: talpha

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Peak Patrol Song__ : Xilonen’s signature weapon which provides needed DEF and teamwide elemental dmg bonus.
__Free­dom-Sworn__ : Her Best-in-slot if your team can make use of ATK% and Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG Bonus. Making use of only 1 of them is also fine. **Notes section includes a good overall baseline for choosing one of these 3**
__Favonius Sword__ : amazing sword for supporting energy hungry teammates.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Flute of Ezpitzal__ : Craftable DEF% sword but not recommended, consider only if you don’t have any of the aforementioned swords.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> DEF or Energy recharge|<goblet> DEF|<circlet> DEF or Healing bonus% or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental skill
**2)** Elemental burst
**3)** Normal attack (Can be left unleveled)

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
If you are using her signature weapon, Peak patrol song, 3200 DEF is where the dmg% for your team caps at. If using favonius sword, running a crit rate circlet can be a viable option if you lack crit rate in your substats. 50% is the recommended minimum for Favonius sword.
Also, here is no such thing as not having " Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City " artifact set on your Xilonen unless you are running a DPS build.

When choosing your weapon, you can consider following as a baseline;
__Really energy hungry team/teammates__: Favonius Sword is best-in-slot
__Playing with Furina and no other healer__: Peak Patrol Song is your best bet.
__Can your team's main damage dealer(s) make use of ATK% and Normal, Charged, and Plunging attack DMG Bonus?__ **If yes**, Freedom-Sworn is best-in-slot; **If no**, Peak Patrol Song or Favonius Sword is best depending on the mentioned reasons above. Making use of only one of the effects of Freedom-Sworn means it becomes roughly the same as Peak Patrol Song
